trans-unit.source: Defines the credential policy to be used for resource requests that are made using <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and its derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 定義要用於資源的要求所使用的認證原則<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>和其衍生的類別。</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The credential policy determines whether to send credentials when sending a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> for a network resource, such as the content of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 認證原則可決定是否要傳送時，傳送認證<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>網路資源，例如 Web 網頁內容。</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: If credentials are sent, servers that require client authentication can attempt to authenticate the client when the request is received instead of sending a response that indicates that the client's credentials are required.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳送認證，需要用戶端驗證的伺服器可以嘗試驗證用戶端，而不是傳送回應，指出所需的用戶端的認證在收到要求時。

trans-unit.source: While this saves a round trip to the server, this performance gain must be balanced against the security risk inherent in sending credentials across the network.
trans-unit.target: 而這會儲存往返到伺服器，必須透過網路傳送認證的固有的安全性風險平衡提高效能。

trans-unit.source: When the destination server does not require client authentication, it is best not to send credentials.
trans-unit.target: 當目的地伺服器不需要用戶端驗證時，最好不要將傳送認證。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ICredentialPolicy policies are invoked only if the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> or the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> that is associated with the request has credentials that are not `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ICredentialPolicy 原則才會叫用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>或<xref:System.Net.WebProxy>關聯與要求有未認證`null`。</xref:System.Net.WebProxy> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: Setting this policy has no effect on requests that do not specify credentials.
trans-unit.target: 設定此原則會有不會影響未指定認證的要求。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to set an ICredentialPolicy policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性來設定 ICredentialPolicy 原則。</xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule> that handles authentication for the request will invoke the <xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy.ShouldSendCredential%2A> method before performing the authentication.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>處理驗證要求將會叫用<xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy.ShouldSendCredential%2A>方法，然後再執行驗證。</xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy.ShouldSendCredential%2A> </xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: If the method returns `false`, authentication is not performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法會傳回`false`，不會執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: An ICredentialPolicy policy affects all instances of <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> with non-null credentials in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: ICredentialPolicy 原則影響的所有執行個體<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>具有目前的應用程式網域中的非 null 認證。</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The policy cannot be overridden on individual requests.
trans-unit.target: 無法覆寫原則，在個別的要求。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the client's credentials are sent with a resource request made using an instance of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Boolean>指出是否隨著使用的<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>類別</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>執行個體所建立的資源要求傳送用戶端的認證</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: After an <xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy> policy has been specified by setting the <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule> that handles authentication for a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> invokes the ShouldSendCredential method before performing the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy>藉由設定已指定原則<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，<xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>該控制代碼的驗證<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>叫用 ShouldSendCredential 方法之前執行驗證。</xref:System.Net.WebRequest> </xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy>

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `false`, authentication is not performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法傳回`false`，不會執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: When the original request has been redirected or proxy authentication is required, the resource identified by `challengeUri` can be different from the requested resource that is specified in <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RequestUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 原始要求已重新導向或，便需要 proxy 驗證時，所識別的資源`challengeUri`可以不同於要求<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RequestUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RequestUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>中指定的資源

trans-unit.source: In the case of redirection, `challengeUri` contains the actual destination <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 在重新導向，`challengeUri`包含實際的目的地<xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: If proxy authentication is required, `challengeUri` contains the address of the proxy server that requires client authentication.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要，proxy 驗證`challengeUri`包含要求用戶端驗證的 proxy 伺服器位址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that will receive the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri>，將會接收要求。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> that represents the resource being requested.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>，代表所要求的資源。</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> that will be sent with the request if this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>，如果將會傳送要求與這個方法會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.IAuthenticationModule"></xref> that will conduct the authentication, if authentication is required.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.IAuthenticationModule"> </xref> ，將會執行驗證，如果需要驗證。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the credentials are sent with the request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果認證會傳送要求。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
